constexpr decltype(auto) operator*() const;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|
constexpr InnerIter operator-&gt;() const
    requires /*has-arrow*/&lt;InnerIter&gt; &amp;&amp; std::copyable&lt;InnerIter&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the element the underlying iterator {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} points to.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|return *inner_;}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|return inner_;}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The current element.
